title: Need to update ignition-math version in Top CMakeLists.txt

content.raw:
The CMake always fails to find the package `ignition-math4` which needs to be updated to `ignition-math5` in order to make the compilation successful.

The CMake gives the following output:

-- ignition-msgs2 version 2.0.0
-- Operating system is Apple MacOS X
--

-- ====== Finding Dependencies ======
-- Looking for Protobuf - found

CMake Warning at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:146 (find_package):
  By not providing "Findignition-math4.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this
  project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by
  "ignition-math4", but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-math4"
  with any of the following names:

    ignition-math4Config.cmake
    ignition-math4-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "ignition-math4" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
  "ignition-math4_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If
  "ignition-math4" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it
  has been installed.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:51 (ign_find_package)


-- Looking for ignition-math4 - not found

CMake Warning (dev) at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:265 (message):
   -- THIS MESSAGE IS INTENDED FOR IGNITION-MSGS AUTHORS --
      (IF YOU SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IT)

  Could not find pkg-config information for ignition-math4.  It was not
  provided by the find-module for the package, nor was it explicitly passed
  into the call to ign_find_package(~).  This is most likely an error in this
  project's use of ign-cmake.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:51 (ign_find_package)
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

-- Looking for ignition-tools - found

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling.
-- 	Missing: ignition-math4
--  END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:64 (message):
  Errors encountered in build.  Please see BUILD ERRORS above.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:61 (ign_configure_build)


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
content.html:
The CMake always fails to find the package ignition-math4 which needs to be updated to ignition-math5 in order to make the compilation successful.

The CMake gives the following output:

-- ignition-msgs2 version 2.0.0 -- Operating system is Apple MacOS X --

-- ====== Finding Dependencies ====== -- Looking for Protobuf - found

CMake Warning at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:146 (find_package): By not providing "Findignition-math4.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-math4", but CMake did not find one.

Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-math4" with any of the following names:

ignition-math4Config.cmake
ignition-math4-config.cmake

Add the installation prefix of "ignition-math4" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set "ignition-math4_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files. If "ignition-math4" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has been installed. Call Stack (most recent call first): CMakeLists.txt:51 (ign_find_package)

-- Looking for ignition-math4 - not found

CMake Warning (dev) at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:265 (message): -- THIS MESSAGE IS INTENDED FOR IGNITION-MSGS AUTHORS -- (IF YOU SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IT)

Could not find pkg-config information for ignition-math4. It was not provided by the find-module for the package, nor was it explicitly passed into the call to ign_find_package(~). This is most likely an error in this project's use of ign-cmake. Call Stack (most recent call first): CMakeLists.txt:51 (ign_find_package) This warning is for project developers. Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.

-- Looking for ignition-tools - found

-- BUILD ERRORS: These must be resolved before compiling. -- Missing: ignition-math4 -- END BUILD ERRORS

CMake Error at /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnConfigureBuild.cmake:64 (message): Errors encountered in build. Please see BUILD ERRORS above. Call Stack (most recent call first): CMakeLists.txt:61 (ign_configure_build)

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
